channel.title: Shield animation help?
channel.description:
ok, my problem is makeing dfs have a animation... all my shield have 1 like in the pic below exept dragonfire shield. i know how to add this for weps makeing them walk, stand ect... Like... [code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587) // D scimmy { return 451;[/code] but not sure on how to do it with a shield...
here is the problem to make it easier.. working~ i am wearing a anchor, "3rd age kite", and a skill cape. i do the skill cape emote and the animation on the emote lifts my arms up over your head like a yawn? works perfect my anchor and 3rd age kite both move with my arms right..
NON working~ i am wearing anchor, "DFS", and a skill cape i do the skill cape emote and the animation does like above exept my "DFS" stays in place it does not lift or move with my char it just floats there till my arm is back in place.. (if pic needed ill add)
[IMG]http://i252.photobucket.com/albums/hh31/jezusismenub/shieldanim.jpg[/img] typo in pic ment to be char not car...

item.title: Shield animation help?
item.dc:creator: @omgwater omgwater
item.description:
@omgwater wrote:

nwe luigi2:

thats wy most ppl dont use that shield silab must shame on herself…

i didn’t know most ppl didn’t use that shield… I just made a dfs spec and wanted it to look right… it looks lame that the shield don’t move but i go in to a blocking stants and shoot fire from my chest…

item.title: Shield animation help?

@omgwater wrote:

ok, my problem is makeing dfs have a animation…
all my shield have 1 like in the pic below exept dragonfire shield.
i know how to add this for weps makeing them walk, stand ect… Like…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587) // D scimmy { return 451;
but not sure on how to do it with a shield…

here is the problem to make it easier…
working~ i am wearing a anchor, “3rd age kite”, and a skill cape. i do the skill cape emote and the animation on the emote lifts my arms up over your head like a yawn? works perfect my anchor and 3rd age kite both move with my arms right…

NON working~ i am wearing anchor, “DFS”, and a skill cape i do the skill cape emote and the animation does like above exept my “DFS” stays in place it does not lift or move with my char it just floats there till my arm is back in place… (if pic needed ill add)
